amendment.description: Amendent requires that the CFPB, before issuing guidance on indirect auto financing, should also conduct a study on the cost and impacts of such guidance to rural consumers and businesses.
amendment.purpose: An amendent No. 2 printed in House Report 114-340 to require that CFPB, before issuing guidance on indirect auto financing, should also conduct a study on the cost and impacts of such guidance to rural consumers and businesses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Smith (MO).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
